Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class ResourceSupplierDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<ResourceSupplierEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.ResourceSupplierDao
Record Components:
projectId - The ID of the project.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ResourceSupplierDao extends AbstractDao<ResourceSupplierEntity>
Retrieves resources associated with a specific project ID.
